languages.text: {n}Кибелла растерянно смотрит на семью Эрэбис. На вас. На свое отражение в стали кинжала.{/n} "Я... не убью... Обязана ли я следовать приказам, когда нутро сжимается, а сердце кричит: это неправильно? Это — не моя воля".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла растерянно смотрит на семью Эрэбис. На вас. На свое отражение в стали кинжала.{/n} "Я... не убью... Обязана ли я следовать приказам, когда нутро сжимается, а сердце кричит: это неправильно? Это — не моя воля".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла растерянно смотрит на семью Эрэбис. На вас. На свое отражение в стали кинжала.{/n} "Я... не убью... Обязана ли я следовать приказам, когда нутро сжимается, а сердце кричит: это неправильно? Это — не моя воля".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah looks in dismay at the Erebis family, at you, at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill. . Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

{n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

{n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

{n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

languages.text: {n}L'air perdu, Kibellah regarde tour à tour la famille Erebis, puis vous, et enfin, son propre reflet dans l'acier de sa dague.{/n} « Je... ne tuerai pas... Dois-je suivre mes ordres quand toutes les fibres de mon être s'y opposent et que mon cœur me hurle de n'en rien faire ? Telle n'est pas ma volonté. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air perdu, Kibellah regarde tour à tour la famille Erebis, puis vous, et enfin, son propre reflet dans l'acier de sa dague.{/n} « Je... ne tuerai pas... Dois-je suivre mes ordres quand toutes les fibres de mon être s'y opposent et que mon cœur me hurle de n'en rien faire ? Telle n'est pas ma volonté. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, consternada, mira a los Erebis, luego a ti, y luego su propio reflejo en el acero de su daga.{/n} «No... no voy a matar... ¿Tengo que seguir órdenes cuando mi propia naturaleza se niega y mi corazón me vocifera que esto está mal? Esta no es mi voluntad».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah, consternada, mira a los Erebis, luego a ti, y luego su propio reflejo en el acero de su daga.{/n} «No... no voy a matar... ¿Tengo que seguir órdenes cuando mi propia naturaleza se niega y mi corazón me vocifera que esto está mal? Esta no es mi voluntad».

languages.text: {n}キベラは動揺しながら、エレビス家、あなた、そして短剣の鋼鉄に映る自分自身へと次々に視線を移した。{/n}「我は…殺しません…我自身が萎縮して、間違っていると心が叫んでいるのに、命令に従うべきなのでしょうか？そんなものは我の意志ではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは動揺しながら、エレビス家、あなた、そして短剣の鋼鉄に映る自分自身へと次々に視線を移した。{/n}「我は…殺しません…我自身が萎縮して、間違っていると心が叫んでいるのに、命令に従うべきなのでしょうか？そんなものは我の意志ではありません」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈看起来忧心忡忡。她先是看了看伊雷比斯家族的所有人，随后看了你一眼，之后又盯着她自己在匕首刀刃上的倒影。{/n}“我……不打算杀人……我的本性在不断退缩，我的心尖叫着，提醒我这是个可怕的错误。在这种情况下，我仍然要服从命令吗？不，我拒绝。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈看起来忧心忡忡。她先是看了看伊雷比斯家族的所有人，随后看了你一眼，之后又盯着她自己在匕首刀刃上的倒影。{/n}“我……不打算杀人……我的本性在不断退缩，我的心尖叫着，提醒我这是个可怕的错误。在这种情况下，我仍然要服从命令吗？不，我拒绝。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah blickt entsetzt zunächst die Familie Erebis und dann dich an, dann ihr eigenes Spiegelbild im Stahl ihres Dolchs.{/n} "Ich ... töte nicht ... Muss ich meine Befehle befolgen, wenn mein gesamtes Wesen davor zurückschreckt und mein Herz schreit, dass es falsch ist? Das ist nicht mein Wille."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah blickt entsetzt zunächst die Familie Erebis und dann dich an, dann ihr eigenes Spiegelbild im Stahl ihres Dolchs.{/n} "Ich ... töte nicht ... Muss ich meine Befehle befolgen, wenn mein gesamtes Wesen davor zurückschreckt und mein Herz schreit, dass es falsch ist? Das ist nicht mein Wille."

languages.text: {n}Tedirginliğe kapılan Kibellah; ilk önce Erebis ailesine, ardından sana, sonrasında da hançerinin çeliğindeki kendi yansımasına bakıyor.{/n} "Ben... Öldürmeyeceğim... Tüm benliğimi ürküten ve yüreğimin yanlışlığını haykırdığı emirlerime itaat etmeli miyim? Bu benim arzum değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah, dismayed, looks first at the Erebis family, then at you, then at her own reflection in the steel of her dagger.{/n} "I... will not kill... Must I follow my orders when my entire nature shrinks from it and my heart screams it is wrong? This is not my will."
